1: <pb/><e>Sb'it jun tic vin̈aj David.</e> <pb/><t>A eb' chuc spensar sna eb' to malaj Dios. Junlajanxon̈ej ix aj sjuanel spensar eb'. Yelxo val te chuc sc'ulej eb'. Malaj mach sc'ulan vach'il.</t>
2: <t>Ato d'a satchaan̈ q'uelanemta Jehová d'a anima, yic syila' tato ay eb' syac'och spensar d'ay, yic syilpaxi tato naan yuj eb'.</t>
3: <t>A juntzan̈ b'eyb'al chuc sb'eyb'alej eb' smasanil. Junlajanxon̈ej tz'aj sjuvib'at eb'. Malaj junoc mach b'oan vach' b'eyb'al. Toton malaj val junoc mach.</t>
4: <t>Icha val to malaj spensar eb' sc'ulan chucal chi'. A eb' chi' satanel eb' yetchon̈ab', icha val to svael eb' yaj eb', max yal-laj sb'a eb' d'a Jehová.</t>
5: <t>Ste ib'xi eb' yuj xivelal, yujto a Dios ayec' yed' eb' vach' sb'eyb'al.</t>
6: <t>Snib'ej eb' syixtejb'at tas nab'il yuj eb' emnaquil, palta a Jehová scolan eb' emnaquil chi'.</t>
7: <t>Comonoc a d'a tzalan Sion scot co colnab'il a on̈ israel on̈ tic. Ayic ol yac'anxi svach'c'olal Dios d'a quib'an̈, ol tzalaj val co c'ool a on̈ yin̈til on̈ vin̈aj Jacob tic. Ol el lenaj ol quila'.</t>
